summary: All files exist at correct locations. Implementation matches spec exactly. Coding standards followed. Data-testid attributes added to key interactive elements.

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Bob's Lightning Address is displayed if available
acceptance_criteria.reason: LightningAddressDisplay reads bobWallet.info?.lud16 and renders it in a styled div with data-testid='address-display'

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Warning shown when Lightning Address not available
acceptance_criteria.reason: Conditional check on !lightningAddress renders yellow warning box with 'No Lightning Address found for this wallet'
Uses isLightningAddress() from @/types for validation on blur and submit. Shows 'Invalid format' error inline when invalid

acceptance_criteria.criterion: LNURL-pay data is fetched on blur
acceptance_criteria.reason: handleAddressBlur calls fetchAddressInfo(address) when isLightningAddress(address) is true
When addressInfo is available, renders min/max with toLocaleString() formatting in a slate-50 info box
Comment Input is disabled when !addressInfo?.commentAllowed. Shows character limit hint when allowed
payToAddress hook creates LightningAddress, calls requestInvoice then client.payInvoice. Success view shows preimage and 'Make Another Payment' button
useLightningAddressPayment calls refreshBalance() after successful payInvoice

All catch blocks use err instanceof Error pattern. Errors displayed via onLog('error') and inline error
